item.title: Python Overview
item.author: xxxx
item.description: This posts only use as a remainder Variable Multiple assignment x, y, name, is_cool = (1, 2.5, 'a name', True) Casting x = str(x) # x will be string y = int(y) # y will be an integer String name = 'Brad' age = 37 print('name is' + name + ' and age is ' + str(age)) print('name is {name} and age is {age}'.format(name = name, age = age)) print(f'name is {name} and age is {age}') Methods # Capitalize string print(s.
